metadata.title: About Us
metadata.description: Discover Bachacode Developers, innovative web development experts since 2021. Learn about our mission for high-quality, personalized digital solutions, ethical values, and skilled team including Fullstack Developers and UX/UI Designers committed to client success.

hero.title: About <keyword>Bachacode Developers</keyword>
hero.description: At Bachacode Developers, we are dedicated to providing innovative and high quality web development solutions. Our team of experts works tirelessly to ensure the satisfaction of our clients, providing personalized services tailored to the specific needs of each project.

our_values.title: Our <keyword>values</keyword>
our_values.subtitle: Ethics that sets us apart from the competition

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We strive to be at the forefront of technology, implementing innovative solutions that drive our customers' success.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Quality is our priority. We are committed to delivering products and services that exceed our customers' expectations.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: We are dedicated to building lasting relationships with our clients, based on trust, transparency and mutual commitment.

our_team.title: Our <keyword>team</keyword>
our_team.subtitle: The professionals who will develop your idea

cristhian.name: Cristhian Flores
cristhian.body: Experienced in interface development and design with both frontend and backend knowledge.

josibel.name: Josibel Farias
josibel.body: Specializing in creating intuitive and engaging user experiences, with a focus on visual design and usability to ensure efficient and enjoyable interfaces.
